summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Bookkeeping Ingestion UI frontend. All backend API tests passed (17/17). Frontend tests passed after fixing 2 bugs. The upload wizard, column mapping, import flow, and history tab are all working correctly.

bugs_fixed.issue: 401 interceptor was redirecting to /login on login failures, preventing error messages from displaying
bugs_fixed.fix: Added check to skip redirect when already on login page

bugs_fixed.issue: SelectItem with empty string value causing React error: 'A <Select.Item /> must have a value prop that is not an empty string'
bugs_fixed.fix: Changed empty string value to 'none' and updated onValueChange handler to convert 'none' back to undefined

bugs_fixed.issue: ESLint error: unescaped quotes in DialogDescription

seed_data_creation: Test batches created during API testing with client IDs: TEST_client_001, TEST_client_parse, TEST_client_import, TEST_playwright_client, TEST_playwright_client2
context_for_next_testing_agent: All ingestion API endpoints are working. Frontend upload wizard flow is complete. History tab shows batch list with rollback buttons for completed batches. Login/logout flow works correctly. Two bugs were fixed during testing: 1) API interceptor redirect issue on login page, 2) SelectItem empty value issue in column mapping. The app uses PostgreSQL database with import_batches and import_audit_log tables.
